cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Fit coefficient of the intensity offset

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Precision of fit coefficient of the intensity offset

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Fit coefficient of the intensity slope

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Precision of fit coefficient of the intensity slope

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Slant column density of oxygen collision induced absorption

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Precision of the slant column density of oxygen collision induced absorption

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Fit coefficient of the inhomogeneity negative shift mean residual

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Precision of fit coefficient of the inhomogeneity negative shift mean residual

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Fit coefficient of the inhomogeneity positive shift mean residual

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Precision of fit coefficient of the inhomogeneity positive shift mean residual

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Fit coefficient of the NH mean residual

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Precision of fit coefficient of the NH mean residual

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Fit coefficient of the tropics mean residual

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Precision of fit coefficient of the tropics mean residual

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Fit coefficient of the Ring effect

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Precision of fit coefficient of the Ring effect

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: root mean square residual of the fit

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Relative azimuth angle between sun and viewing direction at the ground pixel location on the reference ellipsoid.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Solar zenith angle at the surface. Angle is measured away from the vertical.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Viewing zenith angle of the satellite at the ground pixel location on the reference ellipsoid. Angle is measured away from the vertical.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Effective cloud fraction from the S5P OFFL NO2 product

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Cloud optical centroid pressure from the S5P OFFL NO2 product

cd:Attribute.name: flag_meanings
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: no_error solar_eclipse sun_glint_possible descending night geo_boundary_crossing geolocation_error

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This coordinate variable defines the indices for the pixel corners; index starts at 0 (counter-clockwise, starting from south-western corner of the pixel in ascending part of the orbit).

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: offset from reference start time of measurement

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This coordinate variable defines the indices across track, from west to east; index starts at 0.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: A continuous quality descriptor, varying between 0 (no data) and 1 (full quality data). >= 0.5 = good data, >= 0.7 = good data and large SZA, >= 0.8 = good, large SZA, ascending part of orbit

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This coordinate variable defines the indices along track; index starts at 0.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The time in this variable corresponds to the time in the time_reference global attribute.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: time of observation as ISO 8601 date-time string
